verses.verse: <S%G3588><s%> For The Rest <S%G3063><s%> Then, <S%G3767><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> We Beseech <S%G2065><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> We Exhort <S%G3870><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> Ye Received <S%G3880><s%> ' From <S%G3844><s%> Us <S%G2257><s%> <S%G3588><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> It Behooves <S%G1163><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> To Walk <S%G4043><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Please <S%G700><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye Should Abound <S%G4052><s%> More. <S%G3123><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> For Ye Know <S%G1063><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Injunctions <S%G3852><s%> We Gave <S%G1325><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

<S%G5124><s%> For This <S%G1063><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Will <S%G2307><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God's <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G38><s%> Your Sanctification, <S%G5216><s%> To Abstain For <S%G567><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fornication, <S%G4202><s%>

To Know <S%G1492><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> Of You How <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> His Own <S%G1438><s%> Vessel <S%G4632><s%> To Possess <S%G2932><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Sanctification <S%G38><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Honour, <S%G5092><s%>

Not <S%G3361><s%> It <S%G1722><s%> Passion <S%G3806><s%> Of Lust <S%G1939><s%> Even As <S%G2509><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Know Not <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Go Beyond <S%G5233><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Overreach <S%G4122><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Matter <S%G4229><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> His Brother; <S%G846><s%> Because The <S%G1360><s%> Avenger Is <S%G1558><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> These Things, <S%G5130><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We Told Before <S%G4277><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fully Testified. <S%G1263><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Called <S%G2564><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> Uncleanness, <S%G167><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Sanctification. <S%G38><s%>

So Then <S%G5105><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Sets Aside, <S%G114><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> Sets Aside, <S%G114><s%> But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4151><s%> His Spirit <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Us. <S%G2248><s%>

<S%G4012><s%> Now Concerning <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brotherly Love <S%G5360><s%> No <S%G3756><s%> Need <S%G5532><s%> Ye Have For Me <S%G2192><s%> To Write <S%G1125><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G846><s%> For Yourselves <S%G1063><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Taught Of God <S%G2312><s%> Are <S%G2075><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Love <S%G25><s%> One Another. <S%G240><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> For Also <S%G1063><s%> Ye Do <S%G4160><s%> This <S%G846><s%> Towards <S%G1519><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Are In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3650><s%> <S%G3588><s%> The Whole Of Macedonia; <S%G3109><s%> <S%G3870><s%> But We Exhort <S%G1161><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> To Abound <S%G4052><s%> More, <S%G3123><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Endeavour Earnestly <S%G5389><s%> To Be Quiet <S%G2270><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Do <S%G4238><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Your Own Things, <S%G2398><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Work <S%G2038><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2398><s%> With Own Hands <S%G5495><s%> Your, <S%G5216><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> On You <S%G5213><s%> We Enjoined, <S%G3853><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> Ye May Walk <S%G4043><s%> Becomingly <S%G2156><s%> Towards <S%G4314><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Without, <S%G1854><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of No One <S%G3367><s%> Need <S%G5532><s%> May Have. <S%G2192><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> I Do Wish <S%G2309><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> To Be Ignorant, <S%G50><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%>, Have Fallen Asleep, <S%G2837><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Ye Be Not Grieved, <S%G3076><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rest <S%G3062><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Have No <S%G2192><s%> Hope. <S%G1680><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> For If <S%G1063><s%> We Believe <S%G4100><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Died <S%G599><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Rose Again, <S%G450><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Are Fallen Asleep <S%G2837><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Will Bring <S%G71><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G5124><s%> For This <S%G1063><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> We Say <S%G3004><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of The Lord, <S%G2962><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Living <S%G2198><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Remain <S%G4035><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Coming <S%G3952><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> May Anticipate <S%G5348><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Are Fallen Asleep; <S%G2837><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> A Shout Of Command, <S%G2752><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> Archangel's <S%G743><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Trumpet <S%G4536><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Shall Descend <S%G2597><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Shall Rise <S%G450><s%> First; <S%G4412><s%>

Then <S%G1899><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Living <S%G2198><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Remain, <S%G4035><s%> Together <S%G260><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Shall Be Caught Away <S%G726><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Clouds <S%G3507><s%> For The <S%G1519><s%> Meeting <S%G529><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> In The <S%G1519><s%> Air; <S%G109><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Always <S%G3842><s%> With The <S%G4862><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> We Shall Be. <S%G2071><s%>
So <S%G5620><s%> Encourage <S%G3870><s%> One Another <S%G240><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> These Words. <S%G5125><s%>
